front.title: Remote Monitoring MIB Extensions for High Capacity Alarms

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) foruse with network management protocols in the Internet community. Inparticular, it describes managed objects for extending the alarmthresholding capabilities found in the RMON MIB [RFC2819], to providesimilar threshold monitoring of objects based on the Counter64 datatype.
